course_name: Junior Science for Human Movement Studies
description: Applications of principles & methods of curriculum design, teaching and learning to the field of middle years science; preparing curriculum materials & their rationales; observations of teaching.
prerequisites: EDUC3003 or 3004 or 3008 or HM322 or 326 or HM330 or HMST3221, or HMST3261, or HMST3204
